summary:
Mars is a small, rocky planet near the Sun, known for its red color due to iron dust. It's bright in our sky and has been studied through telescopes. Mars has two small moons, Phobos and Deimos. The planet has a unique appearance, with smooth plains in the north and a rough, cratered south. It boasts the largest volcano, Olympus Mons, and a massive canyon, Valles Marineris.

Mars has seasons like Earth due to its tilt, with extreme temperature changes. It formed billions of years ago and has an interesting history, possibly once having water. Spacecraft and rovers have explored Mars since the 1960s, revealing its secrets.
title: Mars
